snippet.name: Getter_Setter
snippet.description: Creates get and set functions for a property
snippet.insertText:
<cffunction name="get$${Variable}" returntype="$${Type}"> <cfreturn this.$${Variable} /> </cffunction>
<cffunction name="set$$Variable}"> <cfargument name="local_$${Variable}" type="$${Type}" /> <cfset this.$${Variable} = local_$${Variable} /> </cffunction>
